## Row {height="100%"}
### Column {width="30%"}

```{r, echo=FALSE}

library(leaflet)

TNC<-read.csv("data/CalGRO_well_locations_extended.csv")

Calgro_map <- leaflet(TNC) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addProviderTiles("Esri.WorldImagery") %>%
  setView(lng = -118.63, lat = 37.6, zoom = 6) %>%
  addCircleMarkers(
    ~Longitude, ~Latitude,
    radius = 1.5,) 
Calgro_map
```

## Row {height="33%"}
### Column {width="70%"}

```{r, echo=FALSE}

library(sf)

my_shapefile <- st_read("data/shapefiles/TNCLands_CalGRO.shp")


my_shapefile_11 <- sf::st_transform(my_shapefile, 4326)
ggplot() + 
  geom_sf(data = my_shapefile_11, size = 1.5, color = "black", fill = "cyan1") + 
  ggtitle("calgro properties") +
  coord_sf(xlim = c(-119,-118), ylim = c(35,35.5))

```
